description: Number of elements of GF(2^n) with trace 0 and subtrace 1.
links: F. Ruskey, Number of irreducible polynomials over GF(2) with given trace and subtrace
F. Ruskey, Number of elements of GF(2^n) of given trace and subtrace
formula: C(n, r+0)+C(n, r+4)+C(n, r+8)+... where r = 2 if n odd, r = 0 if n even.G.f. -x*(1+3*x)/((2*x-1)*(2*x^2+2*x+1)) (conjecture) - _Creighton Dement_, Apr 29 2005
prog: Floretion Algebra Multiplication Program, FAMP Code: tesseq[ - 'i - 'j - 'k - .5i' - .5k' + .5'ii' - 'jj' + .5'kk' + 'ij' - .5'ik' - .5'ji' - .5'jk' - .5'ki' + 'kj']
author: _Frank Ruskey_
